name: The World of Evo
description:
Story

A young boy named Blaze sets out on an epic adventure to see the world, despite his father advising him not to. Blaze Sets out his voyage but he runs into a fierce storm and left standard on an unknown island.

Features

  • Updater Tool embedded into the game so that you can download free monthly updates
  • Free Map updates to make the game longer each month
  • Great Story Line
  • Day And Night and the Time matches with your actual time as well as when it gets to 21:00 it starts to get dark in the game.
  • Change in weather in the game too
  • Job Changer
  • Select Your Party
  • Card Game System
  • 20 Hours of game play
